title: Diazo Print, "Design for Printed Textile-Pebbles, Series #1980-85", 1960
inscribed: Imprinted annotations: upper left corner: match with original drawing; upper center: "horizzontal.../ revise... / ...ebbles; ...at both top and bottom - / of screen; at right center: vertical... / [illeg.] / post... / ...bbles; lower right corner: ...mat on / [illeg] / center original drawing. Across lower margin: [arrows] and "24"
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
description: Irregular scattering of white irregular ovals shapes enclosed in a rectangle on a blue background

tombstone.epitaph: Diazo Print, "Design for Printed Textile-Pebbles, Series #1980-85", 1960.Blueprint on white wove paper. Gift of Alexander H. Girard. 1969-165-355.
